video_prompt: A sprawling, floating city of complex gothic-industrial architecture slowly rotates, revealing interconnected towers, bridges, and a vast network of pipes. Industrial components subtly shift and glow, emphasizing its intricate, steampunk machinery. Dark shadows deepen, then lighten, across its weathered surfaces, revealing new details of its gravity-defying structure.
image_prompt: Highly detailed, intricate, monochromatic floating city in a steampunk/gothic-industrial style. Focus on complex, sprawling architecture of interconnected towers, buildings, bridges, and extensive industrial elements like pipes and machinery. Render in black and white with deep shadows and strong contrast, emphasizing texture and form. Isolate against a plain background.
refined_video_prompt: A sprawling, floating city slowly rotates, continually revealing interconnected towers, bridges, and a vast network of pipes. Industrial components subtly shift and glow, emphasizing its intricate machinery's dynamic operation. Shadows deepen and then lighten across its surfaces, constantly altering its visible details and highlighting its gravity-defying structure.
